text: ( Source : SUNY College at Old Westbury ) The New York Times best-selling graphic novelist Nate Powell visit SUNY Old Westbury on Tuesday, October 6, 2015 to discuss his work on the memoirs of John Lewis , a Congressman and renowned civil
